Title: Authorizes the exercise of jurisdiction over commercial claims in justice courts
Summary: Authorizes justice courts to exercise jurisdiction over commercial claims arising out of a transaction between a claimant and a natural person, wherein the money, property or service which is the subject of the transaction is primarily for personal, family or household purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the uniform justice court act, in relation to authorizing the exercise of jurisdiction over commercial claims in justice courts
